item.title: Ubuntu Network config using netplan
item.description: <br> <br> Static IP Address example /etc/netplan/template.txt # -------------------------- # Static IP Address Example # -------------------------- network: version: 2 renderer: networkd ethernets: eth0: dhcp4: no dhcp6: no addresses: [172.16.57.999/24] gateway4: 172.16.57.1 nameservers: addresses: [172.16.57.5,172.16.57.8] <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br> <br>
